text: "This Is It" is a 1979 song by Kenny Loggins and is the leading single from his third studio album Keep the Fire. It went to number 11 in the United States, number 9 in Canada, number 35 in New Zealand and number 26 in the Netherlands. It won a Grammy Award in 1981. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Kenny Loggins songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: This Is It (Kenny Loggins song)
